# Create an operator
In this section you create an operator and add it to your project page.

In the project page you can create an operator.

__Note__: You require to have permissions to add operators, please send an email to info@tercen.com to ask for it.

![](images/project_create_operator.png)

* Click on **Create an operator**

![](images/create_op.png)

* Fill in the name and click **Next**

![](images/create_op_name.png)

* Select **R** and click **Next**

![](images/create_op_r.png)

* Click **OK**
The default code is a mean operator.

![](images/create_op_code.png)

The operator appears in your project area.

![](images/project_with_op.png)
